I haven't checked this torrent myself, but according to the Russian site linked above this is a PS2 emulation, not a proper PC port. *shrug* I dunno, if you're a big fan of the series download and find out whether it's legit or not.

No doubt, this a PS2 emulation, but if a PS2 game is runs well on your PC, then you get to play the game with better graphics than PS2. I have VirtuaGirl HD on my rig, one advantage I found with PS2 emulation is that I can play the game in fullscreen while the the VGHD dancers are on top layer, best of both worlds. Ill check this out anyway, & let you guys know how it runs.
